title: 3v3 que cancel
body: In champ select the 3v3 mode cancelled  halfway through after we had already picked and were waiting the count down, then it re-added us to the champ select and everything was heaps buggy like we couldnt change summs and masteries etc. then it kicked us again for good. Just let me play my last match before its gone for another week -.-'..... Is it supposed to just kick everyone like that? Does it happen if you're ingame too?
